Reviews.Title: “Location was terrific. Hotel average.”
Reviews.Author: Antony T
Reviews.Content: bit overpriced location amazing heart barri gotic walking distance funicular montjuic ramblas port metro minute foot afield cramped outdated clean safe lobby pokey tidy plenty restaurants cafes suit budgets stones throw hotel nice little balcony hotel tapas bar building wooden arched door sorry remember name excellent tapas beer word warning hotel close town hall locals demonstration taking meeting andor final location town hall absolutely loved location hotel streets staff friendly bit naff hotel fashionable 35 4 im feeling generous recommend

Reviews.Title: “Beware of the bedbugs / Attention punaises de lit”
Reviews.Author: izzie31
Reviews.Content: staff nice advice restaurants etc bedroom awfully dusty floor obviously vacuumed bathroom ok window shut properly hot noisy night drunk people yelling 4 am worse night bitten 25 times bedbugs ruined stay bites incredibly painful 10 days heal night bitten husband conclusion fee hotel careful

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant budget stay.”
Reviews.Author: PeterEllisToon
Reviews.Content: central clean cheap stayed twice times overlooking pedestrianised stree rear street watch balcony looks pretty balconies plants couple beers night balcony nice theres students nearby probably window shut lights day staff arent onto christmas card list neither hate list dude nightshift mint terrible smile basic clean en suite theres common upstairs mingle guests downstairs amazing eatery falafel late night munch fest theres road morning pop coffe pastries little pedestrianised street pretty morning heaven
